de.unifrankfurt.informatik.dbis.dia

Interface DIAService<E,F>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - - the Entity class mapped to the "thing" that is being queried.
    F - - the Filter class that is used to set the filter criteria.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleDIAService

    public interface DIAService<E,F>
    The service-interface for using the DIA-infrastructure.

    The generic DIAService is used for mapping of POJOs (plain old java objects) to a RDF-graph using a Model of the Jena-API. This API aims to solve the problem to receive RDF-data from different sources and summarize that into a simple represantation (a Java-Bean). Mapping of entities is done via the Entity-annotation.

    For further information check the Bachelor-Thesis "Integration von relationalen Datenbanken mit Hilfe von Mitteln des semantischen Webs" of Trang Huynh, Christian Grunert and Markus Wondrak.

    See Also:
    DIAFactory#createService(Class, Class, java.util.Map)} - for instantiating a {@code DIAService}, Entity, Filter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> findAll(java.lang.String var)
      Returns all instances of the given Variable, that are provided by the sources.
      java.util.List<E> query(F filter)
      Queries the underlying sources for the given Filter-object.

    • Method Detail

      • query

        java.util.List<E> query(F filter)
        Queries the underlying sources for the given Filter-object.
        Parameters:
        filter - the Filter-object for that the result should be filtered.
        Returns:
        a List of Entity-objects matching the given Filter-object.

      • findAll

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> findAll(java.lang.String var)
        Returns all instances of the given Variable, that are provided by the sources.

        Parameters:
        var - - the variable of the Entity-class that possible values should be found.
        Returns:
        a List of Strings containing all values of this variable.
